summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4393 for the improvement of Perkins Lane from West Howe Street to West Ray Street, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by curbing and paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 51972, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
